name: Whisk Christmas Hamper
contents: Packet of WHISK Granola with quinoa, lingonberries and cocoa nibs 350g
Jar of WHISK Aronia Berry and Apple Jam 250g
Svenska Kakaobolaget Dominican Republic 70% Chocolate bar 50g
Packaged in a climate smart Carry Bag from Reuse Remade
description: For those wondering, aronia berries, may not be a very common berry, but they are high in fibre, vitamin c, and packed with antioxidants. These berries were picked in by me and a friend in Sunne. It’s always good to keep an eye on the things that grow around you.

Yes, we have included chocolate in the hamper, as it’s the one ingredient that isn’t local. It was our one compromise when it came to ingredients, but ICAM and Svenska Kakaobolaget work hard to ensure transparent and supportive supply chains. The growers of Cocoa and chocolate production should not be developed at the cost of people or our planet.

Our wonderful supplies make it possible for us to create our sweet treats! Supporting local, organic farmers and producers is such an important part of our business, keeping carbon emissions low and ensuring local biodiversity.
Warbro Kvarn || Nordisk Raåvar || Glommersbär || ICAM || Svenska Kakaobolaget || Reuse Remade || Bramleys || Nordisk Söcker || Lilla Labäck

ingredients.details: (Wheat flour, butter, beet sugar**, cocoa powder*, salt and bicarbonate of soda)
(oats, honey, quinoa, oil, lingonberries and cocoa nibs)

ingredients.item: WHISK Aronia Berry and Apple Jam
Svenska Kakaobolaget Dominican Republic 70% Chocolate bar

ingredients.details: (made from up-cycled discarded hotel bed linen and turned into a bag)
Full list of ingredients for all Christmas products in English and Swedish is found here

name: Christmas Vegetable Bag
contents: Delicious KRAV certified vegetables from Lilla Labäck including
description: All the vegetables are grown by Mia and her wonderful team from Lilla Labäck in Lidköping. The Bramleys Äppelgögg is grown and processed by Joacim Holgersson and his English wife Fiona at Bramleys Äppelgårdar in Lidköping and the eggs are from Sten-Sture Stensson farm in Tun.

name: Whisk Gift Voucher
description: Why not treat someone to a box of cupcakes! This voucher is for six regular cupcakes in a returnable box. The recipient gets to choose their cupcake and buttercream flavour.

The voucher will be emailed to you following purchase and you can either send it digitally to the recipient or print it off. If you’d like to include a message please include it in the notes section on the Checkout page.
